history.proof: intros. intros H1 H2. unfold no_msg_from_to, consume_msg. hauto use: findU unfold: UMC.sort, union_mapPCM, union_mapUMC, no_msg_from_to, mark_msg, PCM.sort inv: option, bool.

exceptions.tactic: intros H3 H4 j tms b H5.

exceptions.exn: The reference j was not found in the current environment.
The reference tms was not found in the current environment.

In environment from, to : nat s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage) i : mid H : valid s H0 : no_msg_from_to from to s H1 : mid H2 : TaggedMessage b : bool m : msg TaggedMessage E1 : find i s = Some m H3 : find H1 (upd i (mark_msg m) s) = Some {| content := H2; from := from; to := to; active := b |} Unable to unify "find H1 (upd i (mark_msg m) s) = Some {| content := H2; from := from; to := to; active := b |}" with "b = false".
The LHS of E1 (find i s) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment from, to : nat s : union_map mid (msg TaggedMessage) i : nat H : valid s H0 : no_msg_from_to from to s H1 : nat H2 : TaggedMessage b : bool m : msg TaggedMessage E1 : find i s = Some m H3 : find H1 (upd i (mark_msg m) s) = Some {| content := H2; from := from; to := to; active := b |} Unable to unify "false" with "b".

original: intros. intros H1 H2. unfold no_msg_from_to, consume_msg. intros H3 H4 j tms b H5. unfold find, upd, mark_msg. destruct (find j s) eqn:E1. - specialize (H3 j tms b). intros H6 H7. apply H3. + rewrite E1. reflexivity. + auto. - reflexivity.
